      • start

        public boolean start(long timeoutValue,
                     TimeUnit timeoutUnits,
                     Runnable timeoutTask)
        Start the idle timer if not running
        参数:
        timeoutValue - The idle timeout interval
        timeoutUnits - The idle timeout interval units
        timeoutTask - The runnable to run when the timer times out
        返回:
        true if the task was started and false if it is already running
